title: Reluctant Dragon Mate
description: Don't make important life decisions while drunk... Dakota whole life changes when she swipes yes to a dragon shifter on Mater, the world's only dating app for paranormals. Waking up the next morning, she finds herself alone and only able to think about one thing...he's her mate. Achilles isn't interested in being a mate, his business is far too important for that. When his latest one-night-stand turns out to be more, he doesn't want to accept it. Reluctant Dragon Mate is a standalone shifter romance set in the Paranormal Council Universe.
author: Laura Greenwood
